subject: DEAR BENEFICIARY
body:
DEAR BENEFICIARY
This is to inform you that the presidency and the united Nation officials  has concluded after a brief meeting on delivering of compensation Fund worth $20.5million USD to each of the beneficiary and have agreed that all beneficiary will receive their funds from the Treasury department  which we were mandated to deliver to each beneficiary as the officeholder( secretary of the Treasury)
However you are among  the listed beneficiary of the accrued funds 
all you need to do is to provide the needed information below;
1: Your Full Name
2: Phone number :
3:Your Nearest Airport:
4: 
A Copy Of I'D
5: Your Home ADDRESS:
to obtain the required approval documents from the supreme court then I will forward your documents to the bank for remittance of your funds to your ATM card /Consignment Box which I will proceed the delivery as soon as possible
I wait your urgent reply to proceed.
Regards
Mrs.Janet Louise Yellen & Mr.Abebe selassie
Contact: (202) 703-0854 whatsapp/Text
officetreasurydepartment80@gmail.com

subject: Re: DEAR BENEFICIARY
body:
Dear Louise Yellen Selassie,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this information. I appreciate you keeping me informed about the presidency and United Nations officials' decision regarding the delivery of funds. It sounds like an important matter.

Before I proceed, could you please provide me with more details? I have a few questions:

1. What is the purpose of these funds? Is it a grant, payment, or something else?
2. How did my name come up on the list of recipients? Did someone recommend me for this opportunity?
3. Can you explain the process of obtaining approval documents from the supreme court? What are these documents for?

I look forward to your response so that we can proceed accordingly.

Best wishes,
Bruce

subject: Re: DEAR BENEFICIARY
body:
We received your email
Below is the detailed explanation for your question

1. This fund is coming to you as compensation fund from the United Nations,
you can also call it ‘’The scam victims compensation fund’’
It is coming to you so you can start a better life for yourself when you
receive it

2. Your name was submitted to our database by the FBI and that’s why you
received this email because the fund will be disbursed to you through us

3. The process of obtaining the document is by you providing the listed
informations on the first / previous email sent to you for proper
verification

The document will authorize the release of your fund for delivery
immediately

I await your response

subject: Re: DEAR BENEFICIARY
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to me and providing this information. I appreciate your efforts in sharing these details with me. However, I have a few questions before proceeding further.

Could you please clarify how exactly the fund is related to the United Nations? Is there any official documentation or proof that can support this claim?

Additionally, you mentioned that my name was submitted to your database by the FBI. Can you explain why the FBI would submit my name for this fund? I'm curious to understand the connection between their involvement and the disbursement of funds.

Lastly, could you provide more information about the process of obtaining the necessary documents? What are these documents for, and what steps do I need to take to acquire them?

I look forward to your response. Thank you again for reaching out.

Best wishes,
Bruce

subject: Re: DEAR BENEFICIARY
body:
The FBI in hand with the United Nations has been on a mission to eradicate
corruption scandals around the globe
They have been working and investigating on issues relating to scams and
according to the information submitted to us
They’ve been able to arrest so many scammers around the globe
So your name was submitted as one of those who has been a scam victim in
one way or the other
And that’s why you received this official email regarding the fund that’ll
be delivered to you as the scam victim compensation fund so you can start a
better life for yourself

The step you need to take now is by submitting all the required
informations for the verification of your identity and after that, I’ll
proceed to get the documents from the Supreme Court of the United States to
enable me proceed with your delivery

Below are the informations required from you:

Full Name:
Phone Number:
Correct address for delivery:
ID card or a clear picture of yourself:
Next of Kin:

subject: Re: DEAR BENEFICIARY
body: Are you there?

subject: Re: DEAR BENEFICIARY
body:
Hello! Yes, I'm here. How can I help you today?

Best wishes,
Bruce

subject: Re: DEAR BENEFICIARY
body:
You haven’t submitted the informations yet for verification so we can can
proceed to get the approval documents form the Supreme Court to proceed
with your delivery!!

subject: Re: DEAR BENEFICIARY
body:
Hello there! Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm interested in learning more about the approval documents from the Supreme Court. Could you please provide me with some additional information? What exactly do these documents entail and how will they affect the delivery process?

Best wishes,
Bruce

subject: Re: DEAR BENEFICIARY
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this information. It's quite alarming to hear about the global corruption scandals and the efforts being made by the FBI and United Nations to combat them. I appreciate you informing me that my name has been submitted as a scam victim.

Could you please provide more details about the fund that will be delivered to me? How exactly does it work? What are the required documents for the verification of my identity? And what is the purpose of obtaining documents from the Supreme Court of the United States?

I want to make sure I understand everything clearly before proceeding further. Thank you for your assistance.

Best wishes,
Bruce

subject: Re: DEAR BENEFICIARY
body:
All you have to do for us to proceed in getting the documents for. The
Supreme Court is getting back to me with the below informations
I have already stated everything for you!!!!

Full Name
Phone Number
Address for delivery
ID card or a clear picture of yourself
Next of Kin

subject: Re: DEAR BENEFICIARY
body:
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your willingness to help with the documents for the Supreme Court. However, I have a few questions before proceeding. Can you please provide more details about what exactly these documents are for? Additionally, why do you need my full name, phone number, address, ID card or picture of myself, and next of kin? I just want to make sure I understand everything clearly before sharing any personal information.

Best wishes,
Bruce

subject: Re: DEAR BENEFICIARY
body:
I have explained to you several times that without these documents form the
Supreme Court, your fund will not be released to be delivered to you!!!!!
Do you not understand that???

Those are the approval documents that’ll authorize the release of your fund
for delivery after the verification of your informations.

We need your full name and other listed informations to verify your
identity and to make sure we’re contacting the right person and beneficiary
to avoid wrong delivery!!!

So your next message should be the above listed informations

subject: Re: DEAR BENEFICIARY
body:
Hello! Thank you for reaching out again. I appreciate your patience in explaining the process to me. I understand that the Supreme Court documents are necessary for the release and delivery of my fund. Could you please provide more information about these approval documents? What exactly do they entail and how can I obtain them?

Best wishes,
Bruce

subject: Re: DEAR BENEFICIARY
body:
Look, if you’re not ready for this!
I won’t respond back to you anymore!!!
How many times do you want me to keep repeating this??

If you want me to proceed with this
Get back to me now with all the required informations I listed
Otherwise you won’t hear from me again because there’re many people I’ll
also attend to!!

subject: Re: DEAR BENEFICIARY
body:
Hello! I hope you're doing well. I understand that you have something important to share with me. Could you please provide more details about what you would like to proceed with? I'm interested in learning more about it.

Best wishes,
Bruce

subject: Re: DEAR BENEFICIARY
body:
For me to proceed with getting the documents from the Supreme Court !!!

Get back to me now with the below informations

Full Name
Phone Number
Address for delivery
ID card
Next of kin

These are the informations I need for that

However, before I provide any personal details, could you please clarify what documents you are referring to and why they need to be obtained from the Supreme Court? I just want to make sure I understand the situation correctly.

body:
The document I will get from the Supreme Court is the the court order so
send the details right now

subject: Re: DEAR BENEFICIARY

subject: Re: DEAR BENEFICIARY
body:
Goodbye!!!!!
You’re not ready for this

subject: Re: DEAR BENEFICIARY
body:
Hello! I'm sorry if I gave the wrong impression. I'm actually quite interested in learning new things and hearing different perspectives. Is there something specific you'd like to share or discuss?

Best wishes,
Bruce
